Things come to a head at her youngest sister's wedding when her overbearing mother thrusts her into an orchestrated matchmaking with the ultimate Edo man, Osaze. Osaze is handsome, successful and from a good family, making him perfect Nigerian husband material.
films.info_cast: Dakore Akande, Joseph Benjamin, Marc Rhys

films.title: It
films.synopsis_intro: A group of kids, collectively known as The Losers Club, come face to face with a shapeshifting monster named Pennywise.
films.synopsis_short: A group of kids, collectively known as The Losers Club, come face to face with a shapeshifting monster named Pennywise.
films.synopsis_full:
A small town in Maine is subject to the most horrible of curses. Every 27 years, the inhabitants are plagued by a child-abducting clown named Pennywise.

And it’s been a full 27 years since the last encounter…

Meanwhile, a group of young kids, collectively known as the Losers Club, are struggling with life problems – as they’re the targets of schoolground bullies.

But little do they know that their situation is about to get worse, when they come face to face with a real-life monster.

With fellow children disappearing in their town, and only torn body parts being found, the group seek answers, leading them to the very edge of fear: the evil Pennywise the Clown.

To save their town and banish Pennywise, they must stay alive long enough to discover the key to killing him, while also seeking out what brought them all together in the first place.

In a retelling of Stephen King’s classic novel of the same name, It is directed by newcomer Andrés Muschietti, who also helms Shadow of the Colossus.

It also welcomes a selection of new talent to the silver screen, including Bill Skarsgård (Allegiant) as Pennywise, Finn Wolfhard (Stranger Things) as Richie Tozier, and Nicholas Hamilton (Captain Fantastic) as Henry Bowers.
films.info_cast: Finn Wolfhard, Bill Skarsgård, Nicholas Hamilton

films.title: Jawbone
films.synopsis_intro: A former youth boxing champ attempts a comeback, but must first step into the ring to fight his demons if he is to achieve former glory. Featuring a special exclusive Q&A with Ray Winstone, Barry McGuigan, Johnny Harris, Michael Smiley and Thomas Napper broadcast live from the London premiere.
films.synopsis_short: A former youth boxing champ attempts a comeback, but must first step into the ring to fight his demons if he is to achieve former glory. Featuring a special exclusive Q&A with Ray Winstone, Barry McGuigan, Johnny Harris, Michael Smiley and Thomas Napper broadcast live from the London premiere.
films.synopsis_full:
One-time youth boxing champion, Jimmy McCabe (Johnny Harris), is down and out, having turned to the bottle for comfort. At the very depths of despair, he figures his only hope of redemption lies in the boxing club where he struck gold so many moons ago.

Now reunited with gym owner Bill (Ray Winstone), boxing coach Eddie (Michael Smiley) and promoter Joe (Ian McShane), Jimmy builds up his strength enough to be considered a worthy opponent for hotshot fighter, Damian (Luke J.I. Smith).

But, while flashes of his former brilliance are apparent, the one battle Jimmy can’t seem to conquer is the one with himself. With his boxing family swiftly losing patience and fight night fast approaching, the jury’s out as to whether Jimmy can still cut it in the ring.

Actor Johnny Harris has been making movies since 2000, but broke through in 2006 with a scene-stealing performance in the award-winning and BAFTA nominated London to Brighton, which ended up in Time Out Magazine’s ‘100 Best British Films of All Time’, despite its micro-budget.

Jawbone marks his debut as a screenwriter, as well as starring in the lead role of the troubled Jimmy. Strong support comes from Ray Winstone (The Departed), Ian McShane (John Wick: Chapter 2) and Michael Smiley (Rogue One).

The movie is backed with a soundtrack written and performed by the Modfather himself, Paul Weller.
films.info_cast: Ian McShane, Ray Winstone

films.film_page_name: John Le Carre an Evening with George Smiley
films.title: John Le Carre, An Evening with George Smiley
films.synopsis_intro: Broadcast live from London's Royal Festival Hall, join us for a celebration of one of the world’s greatest writers as he shares the secrets behind the creation of his most beloved character.
films.synopsis_short: Broadcast live from London's Royal Festival Hall, join us for a celebration of one of the world’s greatest writers as he shares the secrets behind the creation of his most beloved character.
films.synopsis_full:
From his extraordinary Cold War novels – such as The Spy Who Came in from the Cold and Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy – to his powerful descriptions of the War on Terror in The Night Manager, A Most Wanted Man and A Delicate Truth, the writing of John le Carré has come to define the last half century.

In a rare public appearance and one-off event, the author reads from his new novel, A Legacy of Spies, which sees the return of his most iconic Cold War characters, as their past comes back to claim them in the present. With a unique question and answer session, this is an unmissable opportunity to experience one of the foremost chroniclers of our age, direct and in his own words.

In conversation le Carré discusses the full breadth of his career spanning five decades, and reflects on the continuing story of his most famous creation, the tubby, bespectacled spy, George Smiley.
films.info_cast: John Le Carre

films.title: Jonas Kaufmann My Italy
films.synopsis_intro: German Tenor Jonas Kaufmann introduces My Italy, a very special concert-documentary.
films.synopsis_short: German Tenor Jonas Kaufmann introduces My Italy, a very special concert-documentary.
films.synopsis_full:
However, Puccini and Verdi are not the main composers chosen for the event, but the golden hits by Nino Rota and Lucio Dalla. The concert from Teatro Carignano in Torino, with the participation of the Orchestra Sinfonica Nazionale della RAI, is conducted by Jochen Rieder.

Kaufmann performs popular all time Italian songs like “Torna a Surriento”, “Cor’ngrato”, “Mattinata”, “Parla più piano”, “Caruso” and “Il canto”. The film shows Kaufmann’s special relationship with the Italian language, the Italian way of life and culture and, of course, Italian music.

films.title: Jumanji
films.synopsis_intro: Four teenagers become trapped in a game, and must transform into different characters to conquer the challenges they face - defeating their own insecurities in the process.
films.synopsis_short: Four teenagers become trapped in a game, and must transform into different characters to conquer the challenges they face - defeating their own insecurities in the process.
films.info_cast: Karen Gillan, Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, Jack Black

films.title: Justice League
films.synopsis_intro: Batman and Wonder Woman call on other metahumans to unite against a common enemy…
films.synopsis_short: Batman and Wonder Woman call on other metahumans to unite against a common enemy…
films.synopsis_full:
Inspired by Superman’s (Henry Cavill) ultimate sacrifice for the good of humanity, Batman (Ben Affleck) and Wonder Woman (Gal Gadot) conspire to create an ultimate team of metahumans to fight against Steppenwolf (Ciarán Hinds) and the threat to humanity he poses.

The ultimate team comprises of three extraordinary metahumans, whos skills and power can be brought together to create a barrier against their common enemy.

Arthur Curry (Jason Momoa) – alias Aquaman – is the king of Atlanis, armed with superhuman strength, speed, and the ability to control the animals of the ocean. Barry Allen (Ezra Miller) – aka The Flash – is able to enter the Speed Force, giving him the ability to move at superhuman speed. Finally, there’s Victor Stone (Ray Fisher), best knowns as Cyborg, who can control technology.

Despite their differences, the team of five extraordinary metahumans unite to protect the world against Steppenwolf. But have they come together in time to make any difference?

Directed by Zack Snyder (Batman v Superman, Watchmen), this epic action blockbuster stars Ben Affleck (Batman v Superman, Gone Girl), Gal Gadot (Batman v Superman, Fast & Furious 6), Jason Momoa (Game of Thrones), Ezra Miller (We Need to Talk About Kevin) and Jay Fisher in his big screen debut.

Experience the spectacular action in IMAX 3D at selected Vue Cinemas!
films.info_cast: Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot, Jeremy Irons

films.title: Kingsman The Golden Circle
films.synopsis_intro: Gadgets, wit and undeniable class: the quintessentially British renegade spies are back. Both of them.
films.synopsis_short: Gadgets, wit and undeniable class: the quintessentially British renegade spies are back. Both of them.
films.synopsis_full:
After an ambiguous departure in the last film, Matthew Vaughn’s much anticipated sequel promises even more action for everyone’s favourite key characters. But this time, it’s in the very un-British Wild West.

Secret agents Eggsy (Taron Egerton) and Merlin (Mark Strong) are about to form a ‘special relationship’ with their American counterparts – an organisation appropriately dubbed Stateside.

The US espionage organisation is every bit Yank that Kingsman is English, complete with headquarters hidden within a whisky distillery, serious guns and, of course, Jeff Bridges. Headed by the no-nonsense Ginger (Halle Berry), Eggsy and Merlin are soon overwhelmed by the attitude and superiority of the American agents’ setup.

As well as adapting to the culture shock of bar brawls and robots, the Englishmen must work with their newfound partners to take on the worst villain they’ve encountered: the wacky, whimsical and wicked Poppy (Julianne Moore).

With promises to surprise and delight fans with mind-blowing sequences and guest appearances from the likes of Elton John and Channing Tatum, Kingsman: The Golden Circle is set to be an unpredictable rollercoaster that’ll have you glued to the screen.

And, if that’s not enough to get your heart racing, there’s also a whisper from Harry (Colin Firth) suggesting “reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated…”
films.info_cast: Taron Egerton, Channing Tatum, Jeff Bridges, Colin Firth

films.title: La Boheme: Live From Taormina 2017
films.synopsis_intro: Every summer, the spectacular Teatro Antico di Taormina attracts legions of opera fans with its 2000-year-old stage and its breathtaking Mt. Etna backdrop. On July 5th, fall in love with La bohème – Puccini’s tragic love story between a young poet and a seamstress, broadcast live to cinemas from this ancient Greek theatre in Taormina, Sicily.
films.synopsis_short: Every summer, the spectacular Teatro Antico di Taormina attracts legions of opera fans with its 2000-year-old stage and its breathtaking Mt. Etna backdrop. On July 5th, fall in love with La bohème – Puccini’s tragic love story between a young poet and a seamstress, broadcast live to cinemas from this ancient Greek theatre in Taormina, Sicily.
films.synopsis_full:
Perched high above the picturesque coast of Sicily and sitting under the shadow of Mt. Etna, Teatro Antico di Taormina has inspired artists for over 2,000 years - from the ancient Greeks and Romans to Woody Allen and today’s opera stars.

Every summer, this romantic and dramatic setting welcomes opera lovers from all over the world. 2017 is no exception, with the staging of Puccini’s La bohème - the tragic love story between a young poet and a seamstress. Directed by Enrico Castiglione, this retelling of the timeless classic will enchant cinema audiences with its intense melodic lyrics, original and refined harmony, instrumental light feel and nuances which are all unmistakable and unique.

For one night only, come and experience this spectacular opera on the big screen, live from Taormina, Sicily.

films.title: La Clemenza Di Tito - Glyndebourne 2017
films.synopsis_intro: Vitellia's path to the throne is thwarted by the man who deposed her father, so she presses her admirer Sesto to murder him.
films.synopsis_short: Vitellia's path to the throne is thwarted by the man who deposed her father, so she presses her admirer Sesto to murder him.
films.synopsis_full:
Vitellia's path to the throne is thwarted by the man who deposed her father, so she presses her admirer Sesto to murder him.

Driven by love, Sesto does his worst. But in return, receives a lesson in forgiveness.
films.info_cast: Steve Davislim, Alice Coote, Kate Lindsey

films.title: La Strada (Re: 2017)
films.synopsis_intro: In a story of true outsiders, Masina plays Gelsomina, a naive young woman sold by her desperate mother to boorish strongman Zampano (an immensely charismatic Anthony Quinn) to be both his wife and performance assistant as he tours central Italy.
films.synopsis_short: In a story of true outsiders, Masina plays Gelsomina, a naive young woman sold by her desperate mother to boorish strongman Zampano (an immensely charismatic Anthony Quinn) to be both his wife and performance assistant as he tours central Italy.
films.synopsis_full: Zampano - a brute by trade and by nature - repeatedly abuses Gelsomina as she struggles to learn the ropes; meanwhile, she finds a kindred spirit in his rival the Fool (Richard Basehart). Soon all three find themselves part of the same travelling circus, but with tragic consequences.
films.info_cast: Anthony Quinn, Giulietta Masina, Richard Basehart

films.title: La Traviata - Glyndebourne 2017
films.synopsis_intro: Alfredo, a young man from the provinces, falls in love with Violetta, the stylish toast of Paris. But she's not the marrying kind - at least not until now.
films.synopsis_short: Alfredo, a young man from the provinces, falls in love with Violetta, the stylish toast of Paris. But she's not the marrying kind - at least not until now.
films.synopsis_full: Alfredo, a young man from the provinces, falls in love with Violetta, the stylish toast of Paris. But she's not the marrying kind - at least not until now. However, their dreams are threatened by both a merciless society that condemns Violetta's racy past and an equally merciless disease.
films.info_cast: Venera Gimadieva, Michael Fabiano, Tassis Christoyannis

films.title: Le Mans 3D
films.synopsis_intro: The inside story of a group of men willing to risk it all in the hunt for glory in the world’s toughest motor race: The 24 Hours of Le Mans.
films.synopsis_short: The inside story of a group of men willing to risk it all in the hunt for glory in the world’s toughest motor race: The 24 Hours of Le Mans.
films.synopsis_full:
The undisputed “King of Le Mans” is the dashing German driver for Audi, André Lotterer. The three-time winner is a master at fighting off pretenders to his throne but, this year, will the hunter become the hunted?

His main challenge is Porsche's Aussie Grit, Formula 1 favorite Mark Webber - back at Le Mans after a long absence and determined to win. Having failed to finish the race in three attempts, and come close to death on the track, he wonders how many more rolls of the dice he might have...

Focusing on the 2015 race, with unparalleled behind-the-scenes access, what plays out is a truly thrilling story of racing guts and glory with endless twists and turns for every team… This is racing seen as a battle for survival.

Presented in 4K 3D and using state-of-the-art technology, this is racing shown on the big screen as it has never before been seen. As Steve McQueen said, "Racing is life, everything else is just waiting.”

The big screen version of Le Mans also includes additional bonus footage, giving you even more edge-of-your-seat action.
films.info_cast: André Lotterer, Mark Webber

films.title: Logan Lucky
films.synopsis_intro: North Carolina is preoccupied with a legendary NASCAR event on Memorial Day weekend. It's the perfect time for a group of siblings to launch a daring heist.
films.synopsis_short: North Carolina is preoccupied with a legendary NASCAR event on Memorial Day weekend. It's the perfect time for a group of siblings to launch a daring heist.
films.info_cast: Katherine Waterston, Daniel Craig, Adam Driver, Channing Tatum

films.title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
films.synopsis_intro: The final battle: Thomas must try to find a cure for the disease that has destroyed most of society. Live or die: everything is about to change...
films.synopsis_short: The final battle: Thomas must try to find a cure for the disease that has destroyed most of society. Live or die: everything is about to change...
films.info_cast: Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Dylan O'Brien, Katherine McNamara

films.title: Molly's Game
films.synopsis_intro: Molly Bloom is a skier, Olympian, entrepreneur and suspected criminal. The true-life story of the woman who started an underground poker game that made her an FBI target.
films.synopsis_short: Molly Bloom is a skier, Olympian, entrepreneur and suspected criminal. The true-life story of the woman who started an underground poker game that made her an FBI target.
films.info_cast: Jessica Chastain, Idris Elba, Kevin Costner

films.title: Murder on the Orient Express
films.synopsis_intro: Hercule Poirot is a renowned detective, but the famed Orient Express throws up what is perhaps his toughest case yet….
films.synopsis_short: Hercule Poirot is a renowned detective, but the famed Orient Express throws up what is perhaps his toughest case yet….
films.synopsis_full:
On a train journey as famous as the detective, Hercule Poirot (Kenneth Branagh), is forced to launch an investigation onboard the Orient Express when a murder is discovered.

With the train stuck due to a snow drift, Poirot is disturbed from his sleep by a cry coming from one of the other compartments.

A wealthy American by the name of Ratchett (Johnny Depp) has been murdered. Poirot faces the difficult challenge of discovering the culprit before it’s too late, and must solve the mystery while all of his suspects are still aboard the train.

Based on the 1934 novel of the same name, Murder on the Orient Express is one of Agatha Christie’s most treasured works, and comes to the big screen once again, after first being lifted from its pages back in 1974.

This brand new adaptation promises to be a blockbuster of a film, with an all-star cast, including the theatrical legend, Kenneth Branagh, set to direct and star as Hercule Poirot himself.

Star Wars’ Daisy Ridley (The Force Awakens) plays Mary Debenham, and is joined with other on-screen murder suspects such as Penélope Cruz (Zoolander 2), Judi Dench (Skyfall), and Willem Dafoe (Finding Dory).
films.info_cast: Johnny Depp, Daisy Ridley, Michelle Pfeiffer

films.title: My Cousin Rachel
films.synopsis_intro: This retelling of Daphne Du Maurier’s classic 1951 novel sees feelings of revenge held by a young Englishman become ever more complicated when hate turns to love.
films.synopsis_short: This retelling of Daphne Du Maurier’s classic 1951 novel sees feelings of revenge held by a young Englishman become ever more complicated when hate turns to love.
films.synopsis_full:
Philip (Sam Claflin) – a young English gent in his twenties – is mourning the death of his much-loved cousin Ambrose, his former guardian.

Having moved to Italy in search of warmer climes, Ambrose succumbed to health problems while in the company of his new wife and Philip’s cousin, Rachel (Rachel Weisz).

Convinced that Rachel murdered Ambrose to inherit his vast fortune, there’s one thing Philip hasn’t accounted for – the emotion of love.

Upon his and Rachel’s next meeting, he succumbs to her charm. Were his suspicions of her murderous nature wrong and unfounded, or is she masquerading behind the guise of her own beauty?

In a whirlwind of emotions, will Philip uncover the truth about his former guardian’s passing, and if he indeed allows himself to fall for Rachel, will he ultimately end up being murdered next?

Directed by Roger Mitchell – famed for his work on classics such as Notting Hill and Changing Lanes – this latest film adaptation of Daphne Du Maurier’s acclaimed novel sees Rachel Weisz (The Light Between Oceans) and Sam Claflin (Me Before You, Keep Watching) take the entwining roles of Rachel and Philip.
films.info_cast: Sam Claflin, Rachel Weisz, Holliday Grainger

films.title: My Life As A Courgette
films.synopsis_intro: The stop-motion animation tells the story of Icarus, a 10-year-old boy raised by his mother who nicknames him Courgette. When his mother dies in an accident, he is placed in a children's home.
films.synopsis_short: The stop-motion animation tells the story of Icarus, a 10-year-old boy raised by his mother who nicknames him Courgette. When his mother dies in an accident, he is placed in a children's home.
films.synopsis_full: Surrounded by other children, he discovers trust, friendship and even love.

films.title: My Little Pony The Movie
films.synopsis_intro: Dark forces begin to infiltrate Equestria - the ponies go on a harrowing journey to put an end to the terror.
films.synopsis_short: Dark forces begin to infiltrate Equestria - the ponies go on a harrowing journey to put an end to the terror.
films.info_cast: Emily Blunt, Liev Schreiber, Kristin Chenoweth

films.film_page_name: NT Live Angels in America Part 1 Millennium Approaches
films.title: NT Live: Angels in America Part 1 Millennium Approaches
films.synopsis_intro: In 1980s America, New Yorkers are walking the line between life and death, as crisis breaks out in the city.
films.synopsis_short: In 1980s America, New Yorkers are walking the line between life and death, as crisis breaks out in the city.
films.synopsis_full:
America in the mid-1980s. In the midst of the AIDS crisis and a conservative Reagan administration, New Yorkers grapple with life and death, love and sex, heaven and hell.

Andrew Garfield (Silence, Hacksaw Ridge) plays Prior Walter along with a cast including Denise Gough (People, Places and Things), Nathan Lane (The Producers), James McArdle (Star Wars: The Force Awakens) and Russell Tovey (The Pass).

This new staging of Tony Kushner’s multi-award winning two-part play is directed by Olivier and Tony award winning director Marianne Elliott (The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time and War Horse).

Part Two: Perestroika, will also be broadcast live on 27 July 2017.
films.info_cast: Andrew Garfield, Denise Gough, Nathan Lane

films.film_page_name: NT Live Angels in America Part 2 Perestroika
films.title: NT Live: Angels in America Part 2 Perestroika
films.synopsis_intro: America in the mid-1980s. In the midst of the AIDS crisis and a conservative Reagan administration, New Yorkers grapple with life and death, love and sex, heaven and hell.
films.synopsis_short: America in the mid-1980s. In the midst of the AIDS crisis and a conservative Reagan administration, New Yorkers grapple with life and death, love and sex, heaven and hell.
films.synopsis_full:
Andrew Garfield (Silence, Hacksaw Ridge) plays Prior Walter along with a cast including Denise Gough (People, Places and Things), Nathan Lane (The Producers), James McArdle (Star Wars: The Force Awakens) and Russell Tovey (The Pass).

This new staging of Tony Kushner’s multi-award winning two-part play is directed by Olivier and Tony award winning director Marianne Elliott (The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time and War Horse). Part One: Millennium Approaches was first performed at the National Theatre in 1992 and was followed by Part Two: Perestroika the following year.

Part One: Millennium Approaches will be broadcast live on 20 July 2017.
films.info_cast: Andrew Garfield, Denise Gough, Nathan Lane

films.title: NT Live: Salomé
films.synopsis_intro: The story of Salomé has been told before, but never like this.
films.synopsis_short: The story of Salomé has been told before, but never like this.
films.synopsis_full:
An occupied desert nation. A radical from the wilderness on hunger strike. A girl whose mysterious dance will change the course of the world.
This charged retelling turns the infamous biblical tale on its head, placing the girl we call Salomé at the centre of a revolution.

Internationally acclaimed theatre director Yaël Farber (Les Blancs) draws on multiple accounts to create her urgent, hypnotic production which will be broadcast live from the stage of the National Theatre. ‘Epic. A near-perfect production.’ Guardian (on Les Blancs )

films.title: NT Live: Yerma
films.synopsis_intro: The incredible Billie Piper (Penny Dreadful, Great Britain) returns in her Evening Standard Best Actress award-winning role.
films.synopsis_short: The incredible Billie Piper (Penny Dreadful, Great Britain) returns in her Evening Standard Best Actress award-winning role.
films.synopsis_full:
A young woman is driven to the unthinkable by her desperate desire to have a child in Simon Stone’s radical production of Lorca’s achingly powerful masterpiece.

The unmissable theatre phenomenon sold out at the Young Vic and critics call it ‘an extraordinary theatrical triumph’ (The Times) and ‘stunning, searing, unmissable’ (Mail on Sunday). Billie Piper’s lead performance is described as ‘spellbinding’ (The Evening Standard), ‘astonishing’ (iNews) and ‘devastatingly powerful’ (The Daily Telegraph).

Set in contemporary London, Piper’s portrayal of a woman in her thirties desperate to conceive builds with elemental force to a staggering, shocking, climax. Please note that this broadcast does not have an interval.
★★★★★
"Brutal yet ferociously funny", Metro
★★★★★
"Billie Piper makes a shattering Yerma in Simon Stone’s inspired reworking of Lorca", The Observer
★★★★★
"A shatteringly powerful reinvention of a familiar classic", The Independent
films.info_cast: Billie Piper

films.title: Otello - Royal Opera, London 2016/17
films.synopsis_intro: World-famous tenor Jonas Kaufmann makes his role debut as Otello in Verdi's passionate retelling of Shakespeare's great tragedy of jealousy, deception and murder.
films.synopsis_short: World-famous tenor Jonas Kaufmann makes his role debut as Otello in Verdi's passionate retelling of Shakespeare's great tragedy of jealousy, deception and murder.
films.synopsis_full: Soprano Maria Agresta will be his Desdemona and baritone Ludovic Tezier his nemesis Iago in a new production by Olivier Award winning director Keith Warner.
films.info_cast: Jonas Kaufmann

films.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
films.synopsis_intro: The sequel to the 2013 sci-fi action smash hit.
films.synopsis_short: The sequel to the 2013 sci-fi action smash hit.
films.info_cast: Scott Eastwood, John Boyega, Levi Meaden

films.title: Paddington 2
films.synopsis_intro: When something special of Paddington’s is stolen, the adventure-loving bear and his adoptive family must solve a mystery and find the thief.
films.synopsis_short: When something special of Paddington’s is stolen, the adventure-loving bear and his adoptive family must solve a mystery and find the thief.
films.synopsis_full:
After finally being accepted into the Brown family, Paddington (Ben Whishaw) has become quite the neighbourhood attraction. After all, it’s not every day you see a talking bear – even in London!

Despite his small fame and loving adoptive family, Paddington has never forgotten the family he left behind, namely his beloved Aunt Lucy, who is about to turn 100 years old.

On the search for a gift that his Aunt will adore, Paddington discovers a beautiful, unique pop-up book in an antique shop, owned by one of his many friends. Agreeing to undertake lots of odd-jobs for the owner, Paddington finally earns enough money to by the book for his aunt in time for her birthday – success!

Unfortunately for Paddington, a thief steals his hard-earned present. Upset, he turns to the Brown family to help him track down the thief and retrieve the book.

Following the huge acclaim of Paddington in 2014, Paddington 2 sees Ben Whishaw (Skyfall) reprise his role as the voice of the iconic bear. Hugh Bonneville (Downton Abbey) and Sally Hawkins (Made in Dagenham) also return as Mr and Mrs Brown, with Hugh Grant (Notting Hill) and Brendan Gleeson (Edge of Tomorrow) joining the cast.

A film that the whole family is sure to adore, book tickets for Paddington 2 to join the adventure!
films.info_cast: Hugh Grant, Ben Whishaw, Brendan Gleeson

films.title: Perfect Blue
films.synopsis_intro: Leaving the world of J-pop behind her, Mima Kirigoe begins life as an actress on a crime drama show called Double Blind. When offered a lead role in the show as a rape victim, Mima accepts the role despite reservations from her manager.
films.synopsis_short: Leaving the world of J-pop behind her, Mima Kirigoe begins life as an actress on a crime drama show called Double Blind. When offered a lead role in the show as a rape victim, Mima accepts the role despite reservations from her manager.
films.synopsis_full:
However, the backlash from fans over her career change and a strange website called ‘Mima’s Room’ written by a fake Mima begin to worry her. When a stalker appears and people involved in Double Blind begin turning up dead and all the evidence pointing to her, Mima is thrown into a state of confusion, madness and paranoia

Directed by the late Satoshi Kon and critically acclaimed as one of the finest examples of an animated thriller, Perfect Blue will leave you shocked and more than a little spooked. It comes as part of the season of Screen Anime - a selection of the best and brightest Japanese animated releases on UK cinema screens.

films.title: Peter Pan - NT Live 2017
films.synopsis_intro: All children, except one, grow up…
films.synopsis_short: All children, except one, grow up…
films.synopsis_full:
Captured live at the National Theatre, a recorded performance of JM Barrie’s much-loved tale screens in cinemas this summer.

When Peter Pan, leader of the Lost Boys, loses his shadow, headstrong Wendy helps him to reattach it. In return, she is invited to Neverland, where Tinker Bell the fairy, Tiger Lily and the vengeful Captain Hook await. A riot of magic, music and make-believe ensues.

A delight for children and adults alike, Sally Cookson (NT Live: Jane Eyre) directs this wondrously inventive production, a co-production with Bristol Old Vic theatre. 

★★★★★
‘Spellbindingly imaginative. A dazzling production.’
Radio Times

films.title: Ready Player One
films.synopsis_intro: When an internet genius dies, he leaves behind a series of clues, challenging like-minded people to find the fortune he left behind.
films.synopsis_short: When an internet genius dies, he leaves behind a series of clues, challenging like-minded people to find the fortune he left behind.
films.info_cast: Ben Mendelsohn, T.J. Miller, Hannah John-Kamen

films.title: Robin Hood Origins
films.info_cast: Taron Egerton, Jamie Dornan, Ben Mendelsohn

films.title: Rough Night
films.synopsis_intro: Miami beach. A bachelorette weekend. A male stripper is found dead on the beach...Chaos ensues.
films.synopsis_short: Miami beach. A bachelorette weekend. A male stripper is found dead on the beach...Chaos ensues.
films.synopsis_full:
Five friends from college plan the reunion of the year – or rather, the decade. The bachelorette party to end all parties. However, they’re about to get more than they bargained for when the drinks start to flow.

The setting for their blowout is a beach house in sunny Miami – the ideal place for drinking, dancing and reminiscing. As predicted, the party is raving… Even more so when a male stripper turns up.

However, things are about to take one heck of a turn for the worse when the stripper dies - and it's their fault...

How will the five friends explain what has happened. And how do they deal with having a body on their hands?

Rough Night features an all-star cast, most notably Scarlett Johansson (Captain America: Civil War) as Jess and Demi Moore (Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle) as Lea.

They’re joined on set by other notable talent: Zoë Kravitz (Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them), Kate McKinnon (Office Christmas Party) and Jillian Bell (22 Jump Street).
films.info_cast: Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon, Zoë Kravitz

films.film_page_name: The Royal Ballet Alices Adventures in Wonderland
films.title: Royal Ballet: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
RSC Live: Antony & Cleopatra
films.synopsis_intro: Iqbal Khan directs Shakespeare’s tragedy of love and duty, picking up the story where Julius Caesar ends.
films.synopsis_short: Iqbal Khan directs Shakespeare’s tragedy of love and duty, picking up the story where Julius Caesar ends.
films.synopsis_full:
Following Caesar’s assassination, Mark Antony has reached the heights of power. Now he has neglected his empire for a life of decadent seduction with his mistress, Cleopatra, Queen of Egypt. Torn between love and duty, Antony’s military brilliance deserts him, and his passion leads the lovers to their tragic end.

Iqbal Khan returns to the RSC to direct, following his critically acclaimed productions of Othello (2015) and Much Ado About Nothing (2012).

films.title: RSC Live: Coriolanus
films.synopsis_intro: A full-throttle war play that revels in the sweat of the battlefield, Coriolanus transports us back to the emergence of the republic of Rome.
films.synopsis_short: A full-throttle war play that revels in the sweat of the battlefield, Coriolanus transports us back to the emergence of the republic of Rome.
films.synopsis_full:
Caius Martius Coriolanus is a fearless soldier but a reluctant leader. His ambitious mother attempts to carve him a path to political power, but he struggles to change his nature and do what is required to achieve greatness. In this new city state struggling to find its feet, where the gap between rich and poor is widening every day, Coriolanus must decide who he really is and where his allegiances lie.

Rome Season Director, Angus Jackson, Completes the Royal Shakespeare Company’s collection of Shakespeare’s Roman plays with a visceral production which sees Sope Dirisu (One Night in Miami, Donmar Warehouse 2016) take on the title role.

films.title: RSC Live: Titus Andronicus
films.synopsis_intro: The decay of Rome reaches violent depths in Shakespeare’s most bloody play.
films.synopsis_short: The decay of Rome reaches violent depths in Shakespeare’s most bloody play.
films.synopsis_full:
Titus is a ruler exhausted by war and loss, who relinquishes power but leaves Rome in disorder. Rape, cannibalism and severed body parts fill the moral void at the heart of this corrupt society.

Shakespeare’s gory revenge tragedy presents us with murder as entertainment, and, as the body count piles up, poses questions about the nature of sexuality, family, class and society.

Blanche McIntyre returns to the RSC to direct Shakespeare’s brutal revenge tragedy after her debut directing The Two Noble Kinsmen (2016).

films.title: RSC Live: Twelfth Night
films.synopsis_intro: ‘I am all the daughters of my father’s house, and all the brothers too...’
films.synopsis_short: ‘I am all the daughters of my father’s house, and all the brothers too...’
films.synopsis_full:
Twelfth Night is a tale of unrequited love – hilarious and heartbreaking. Two twins are separated in shipwreck, and forced to fend for themselves in a strange land. The first twin, Viola, falls in love with Orsino, who dotes on Olivia who falls for Viola but is idolized by Malvolio. Enter Sebastian, who is the spitting image of his twin sister…

Christopher Luscombe, director of the ‘glorious' (Daily Telegraph) Love’s Labour’s Lost and Much Ado About Nothing (2014 and 2016), returns to the Royal Shakespeare Company to tackle Shakespeare’s greatest comedy, a brilliantly bittersweet account of “the whirligig of time”.

films.title: Saw: Legacy
films.synopsis_intro: The iconic horror series returns...
films.synopsis_short: The iconic horror series returns...
films.info_cast: Tobin Bell

films.title: Sing
films.cert_desc: very mild bad language, threat, rude humour
films.synopsis_intro: To save his theatre from closing down, Buster the koala decides to host a singing competition. As the local talent assembles, things begin to turn into a zoo. But you know what they say – the show must go on…
films.synopsis_short: To save his theatre from closing down, Buster the koala decides to host a singing competition. As the local talent assembles, things begin to turn into a zoo. But you know what they say – the show must go on…
films.synopsis_full:
The world of show-business is turbulent – when you’re up, you’re flying. But when you’re down, it’s the pits.

Buster Moon (Matthew McConaughey) is familiar with this roller coaster. He’s a koala who owns a theatre in a society where the stage is rapidly being swallowed by the reign of the screen. Buster Moon is in the pits.

However, he’s not one to bow out so easily.

To save his business from closing down, he and his friend Eddie the sheep (John C. Reilly) devise the ultimate money-raising event – a singing competition.

News of the auditions spreads throughout the neighbourhood, and those who dare to bare their talent are soon lining up around the block.

Rosita the pig (Reese Witherspoon) dreams of breaking out of her wife/mother domestic routine and showcasing her star power.

Ash the porcupine (Scarlett Johansson) wants to shatter conventions and bring her alternative vibe to central stage.

Johnny the gorilla (Taron Egerton) hopes to surpass his father’s expectations and find a pathway of his own.

As the motley crew attempt to bring their voices together ahead of opening night, the entire competition turns into a complete zoo.

But you know what they say – the show must go on…

Director Garth Jennings (The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy) assembles a star-studded ensemble comedy voices in this charming and hilarious family film. See it in 3D to get a theatrical experience that Buster would be proud of!
films.info_cast: Reese Witherspoon, Matthew McConaughey

films.title: Sofia Coppola's La Traviata
films.synopsis_intro: A collaboration between American film-maker Sofia Coppola and Italian haute couture king Valentino comes in the form of a revival of Giuseppe Verdi’s classic opera, La Traviata.
films.synopsis_short: A collaboration between American film-maker Sofia Coppola and Italian haute couture king Valentino comes in the form of a revival of Giuseppe Verdi’s classic opera, La Traviata.
films.synopsis_full: Violetta Valéry is a well-known courtesan in Paris whose life appears to be glamorous, but who also suffers from a serious illness. She lives on the money given to her by her male patrons. But when she meets Alfredo Germont, a young man from a good family, they fall in love and move to the country. Alfredo’s father disapproves of their relationship and comes to tell Violetta that her involvement with Alfredo will ruin his family’s reputation. Out of her love for Alfredo, Violetta agrees to leave him and returns to Paris. Thinking she has betrayed him, Alfredo is heartbroken. He follows her to a party and publicly insults her. A few months later, Violetta is close to death. Alfredo, who has learned why Violetta left him, returns to her. He is shocked by her weakness as she strains to get to her feet. They vow to be together forever, but she soon collapses and breathes her last.

films.title: Son of Bigfoot
films.synopsis_intro: When teenager, Adam, discovers his long-lost father is none other than the legendary Bigfoot, things begin to get more than a little hairy…
films.synopsis_short: When teenager, Adam, discovers his long-lost father is none other than the legendary Bigfoot, things begin to get more than a little hairy…
films.synopsis_full:
Fitting in as a teenager is almost never easy, and nobody understands that more than Adam. Written off as an outsider by his peers, he spends much of his time pondering the mysterious circumstances surrounding the disappearance of the father he has never even met.

But, when Adam turns detective and sets out on a daring mission to uncover the truth behind his elusive father’s whereabouts, he gets much more than he bargained for.

Not only is his next-of-kin alive and well, but he also happens to be none other than the legendary beast known as Bigfoot! As Adam makes up for lost time with his new-found parent, he learns the sinister reason behind his father’s disappearance.

An unsavoury corporation known as HairCo. have had their sights set on Bigfoot for years, keen to run a series of scientific experiments on his DNA so they can use it for their own personal gain.

Worse still, HairCo. have been spying on Adam for some time, and when they learn he has inherited his father’s superpowers, they will stop at nothing to imprison the extraordinary duo!

Studiocanal presents The Son of Bigfoot, which is yet another animated gem directed by Jeremy Degruson (Thunder and the House of Magic) and Ben Stassen (The Queen’s Corgi).
films.info_cast: Bob Barlen, Cal Brunker

films.title: Spark
films.synopsis_intro: 'Spark' and his friends embark on a mission to save their planet from the dictatorship of a tyrannical General, who took over the Kingdom of Bana.
films.synopsis_short: 'Spark' and his friends embark on a mission to save their planet from the dictatorship of a tyrannical General, who took over the Kingdom of Bana.
films.info_cast: Jace Norman, Jessica Biel, Rob deLeeuw

films.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
films.synopsis_intro: Peter Parker juggles the highs and lows of adolescence with his newfound powers, and learns life is tough when you’re a teenage superhero with the weight of the world on your shoulders.
films.synopsis_short: Peter Parker juggles the highs and lows of adolescence with his newfound powers, and learns life is tough when you’re a teenage superhero with the weight of the world on your shoulders.
films.synopsis_full:
After his first brush of danger doing battle alongside Iron Man, Peter Parker returns home to Aunt May, where his normal life presents a very different set of problems.

School is a drag, money is tight and he is forbidden to use his superpowers to win the heart of the cute girl he can’t stop staring at.

But, Peter doesn’t have too much time to ponder the trappings of adolescence. As he dons his spandex costume and transforms into his alter-ego of Spider-Man, he finds himself in demand in the crime-riddled city he calls home.

When a new threat lands in NYC in the shape of a winged antagonist named Vulture, Peter must set aside his own personal angst and fight for the lives of those he loves, while keeping his new identify a secret.

Spider-Man: Homecoming marks a welcome return to one of Marvels best-loved superheroes. Starring Tom Holland (Avengers: Infinity War) as the mighty webslinger, aka Peter Parker, the movie also features Robert Downey Jr. (Captain America: Civil War) as Iron Man, who acts as mentor to the fledgling hero.

The strong support continues with Michael Keaton (Birdman) as Vulture, and Marisa Tomei (The Big Short) as Aunt May.

Immerse yourself in the on-screen action and book Spider-Man: Homecoming in eye-popping 3D, IMAX or IMAX 3D at selected Vue Cinemas!
films.info_cast: Robert Downey Jr., Marisa Tomei, Tom Holland

films.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
films.synopsis_intro: In the everlasting battle between dark and light, Rey’s intergalactic journey continues…
films.synopsis_short: In the everlasting battle between dark and light, Rey’s intergalactic journey continues…
films.synopsis_full:
Following on from the events of The Force Awakens, The Last Jedi sees Rey (Daisy Ridley) continue her epic journey from humble beginnings as a scavenger on Jakku to becoming entangled with the First Order.

In the next chapter of the Star Wars saga, Finn (John Boyega), Poe (Oscar Isaac), and Luke Skywalker (Mark Hamill) continue their fight against the dark side, as their friendship bonds grow ever stronger.

With Ridley (Murder on the Orient Express), Boyega (Attack the Block), Hamill (Kingsman: The Secret Service), Carrie Fisher (Family Guy) and others reprising their roles as key characters within the Star Wars universe.

The Last Jedi also sees a host of famous faces join them on the big screen, with Domhnall Gleeson (About Time) portraying General Hux, Andy Serkis (Avengers: Age of Ultron) as Supreme Leader Snoke, and Billie Lourd (Scream Queens) as Lieutenant Connix.

With The Force Awakens being directed by the legendary J.J. Abrams, and Rogue One being helmed by Gareth Edwards, the latest instalment sees Rian Johnson taking to the director’s chair, with TV series Breaking Bad and Looper already on his CV.

See The Last Jedi in jaw-dropping 3D at Vue Cinemas!
films.info_cast: Daisy Ridley,John Boyega,Mark Hamill

films.title: The Beguiled
films.synopsis_intro: An injured Union offer is imprisoned in a Confederate girls’ boarding school, and thinks up a novel but treacherous way to spend his time there.
films.synopsis_short: An injured Union offer is imprisoned in a Confederate girls’ boarding school, and thinks up a novel but treacherous way to spend his time there.
films.synopsis_full:
It’s the 19th century and America is in the midst of a civil war – one that will go down in history. Amidst the chaos and carnage of the front lines, an injured Union officer is cooped up in a Confederate girls’ boarding school.

Injured and imprisoned, the solider must pass his time there in some way, but how?

Surrounded by women, he gets to know many of them personally, conning his way into each of their hearts.

Lonely and eventually angry, the women all turn on one another when these acts of betrayal are discovered, but what will happen when the target for their anger points at him?

The Beguiled stars Colin Farrell (Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them) as the imprisoned Union officer and twister of hearts, and is supported on screen by Elle Fanning (Maleficent), Nicole Kidman (Secret in Their Eyes), and Kirsten Dunst (Bachelorette), as three of the women whom he targets with his affections.

Directed by Sophia Coppola, daughter of the notable Francis Ford Coppola, she has previously helmed box office successes such as Lost in Translation in 2003.
films.info_cast: Colin Farrell, Elle Fanning, Nicole Kidman

films.title: The Commuter
films.synopsis_intro: The daily commute turns from mundane into insane, when a man unintentionally gets involved in a crime...
films.synopsis_short: The daily commute turns from mundane into insane, when a man unintentionally gets involved in a crime...
films.info_cast: Liam Neeson, Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson

films.title: The Dark Tower
films.synopsis_intro: A gun-slinging knight, an ageless wizard and an intrepid 11-year-old adventurer seek the mystical Dark Tower, in a race against time, and each other.
films.synopsis_short: A gun-slinging knight, an ageless wizard and an intrepid 11-year-old adventurer seek the mystical Dark Tower, in a race against time, and each other.
films.synopsis_full:
Jake (Tom Taylor) yearns for adventure, so when he starts to uncover a series of clues hinting towards an alternative dimension, he eagerly seeks to unravel their mystery. His commitment pays off, as Jake is unexpectedly carried to Mid-World, an Old West-style dimension on the brink of collapse.

In this new world, Jake meets loner frontiersman Roland Deschain (Idris Elba), who is on a mission to locate the Dark Tower, based in End-World. Mid-World is quickly becoming extinct, and only the power that resides within the Dark Tower can help to save his home.

Together, the pair use their special abilities to travel to the Dark Tower, but their journey is a perilous one. A host of monsters are blocking their way, while the evil Walter Padick (Matthew McConaughey), an ageless wizard, seeks to reach the Dark Tower himself, for his own wicked gains.

Based on the best-selling and universally beloved Dark Tower series by Stephen King, The Dark Tower is the first on-screen adaptation of the series, with Idris Elba (Star Trek Beyond, Avengers: Age of Ultron), Matthew McConaughey (Dallas Buyers Club, Interstellar) and new-comer Tom Taylor taking the starring, legendary roles. 

A bold, hotly anticipated adaptation, The Dark Tower is the first in a planned range of film and TV shows to explore this expansive universe, and bring King’s legendary writing to life.
films.info_cast: Katheryn Winnick, Matthew McConaughey, Idris Elba

films.title: The Darkest Minds
films.synopsis_intro: A killer disease wipes out 98% of America’s children, leaving the survivors with a range of supernatural powers and locked up in government camps. When a 16-year-old girl manages to escape, she joins a gang of teenagers in a quest for freedom.
films.synopsis_short: A killer disease wipes out 98% of America’s children, leaving the survivors with a range of supernatural powers and locked up in government camps. When a 16-year-old girl manages to escape, she joins a gang of teenagers in a quest for freedom.
films.info_cast: Gwendoline Christie, Mandy Moore, Amandla Stenberg

films.title: The Equalizer 2
films.synopsis_intro: Denzel Washington stars as an ex-agent who is on a mission for revenge...
films.synopsis_short: Denzel Washington stars as an ex-agent who is on a mission for revenge...
films.info_cast: Denzel Washington

films.title: The Greatest Showman
films.synopsis_intro: A biographical drama about the man who founded one of the most famous circuses of all time - P. T. Barnum.
films.synopsis_short: A biographical drama about the man who founded one of the most famous circuses of all time - P. T. Barnum.
films.info_cast: Hugh Jackman, Rebecca Ferguson, Michelle Williams, Zac Efron

films.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
films.synopsis_intro: A hit man and a bodyguard become unlikely allies in the face of a common foe. To take down a notorious dictator, they must work together to reach the International Court of Justice in time to testify.
films.synopsis_short: A hit man and a bodyguard become unlikely allies in the face of a common foe. To take down a notorious dictator, they must work together to reach the International Court of Justice in time to testify.
films.synopsis_full:
A bodyguard with a history (Ryan Reynolds) is about to get a new client. One he has met before – but not necessarily protected before.

In fact, the man he must now shield is a former enemy and hit man (Samuel L. Jackson). As this hit man makes his way to the International Court of Justice, the bodyguard must prevent him from any harm that may come his way.

And there’s one huge reason as to why he could be targeted – as he is about to testify against one of the world’s most notorious dictators (Gary Oldman).

The two former enemies must put their animosities to one side to work together to arrive at court unharmed and on time, to take down their common foe.

Ryan Reynolds (Deadpool) is joined on screen in The Hitman’s Bodyguard by seasoned actor and household name, Samuel L. Jackson (Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children), and the equally as recognisable Gary Oldman (Dawn of the Planet of the Apes), while Élodie Yung (Gods of Egypt), and Salma Hayek (Sausage Party) both join the cast.

Helmed by Patrick Hughes, the Australian director has previously worked on several successful short films before getting his big break with The Expendables 3 in 2014.
films.info_cast: Ryan Reynolds, Samuel L. Jackson, Salma Hayek

films.title: The House
films.synopsis_intro: After spending their daughter's college fund, a couple try to earn fast cash through another method - by opening an illegal casino in their basement.
films.synopsis_short: After spending their daughter's college fund, a couple try to earn fast cash through another method - by opening an illegal casino in their basement.
films.synopsis_full:
Scott and his wife (Will Ferrell and Amy Poehler) aren’t exactly responsible parents. In fact, they’ve completely destroyed their poor daughter’s college fund.

But not to worry – they’ve got a plan to recoup it all. It’s a plan that involves illegal activities in the couple’s basement, but a plan nonetheless.

Teaming up with their neighbours, Scott and his wife agree to start up an underground casino beneath their house, in order to earn enough money to fund their daughter’s educational ambitions.

Starring the legendary comedic actor Will Ferrell (Zoolander No. 2) and Amy Poehler (Monsters vs. Aliens), The House also features the talents of Ryan Simpkins (Arcadia) and Andy Buckley (Jurassic World).

Director Andrew J. Cohen may not have many have many full-length feature films to his name, but his work as a writer on recent comedies Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates and Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising means that Cohen is no stranger to the genre.
films.info_cast: Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler, Allison Tolman

films.title: The Lego Batman Movie
films.synopsis_intro: Batman (Will Arnett) is a lone vigilante, spending his life beating up bad guys, and attending glamourous parties. But if he wants to defeat his greatest enemy yet, he needs to learn how to play with others…
films.synopsis_short: Batman (Will Arnett) is a lone vigilante, spending his life beating up bad guys, and attending glamourous parties. But if he wants to defeat his greatest enemy yet, he needs to learn how to play with others…
films.synopsis_full:
Spending most of his free time completely alone, his faithful butler Alfred (Ralph Fiennes) declares that Batman must learn to lighten up a little… and take care of the orphaned child he once adopted, Robin (Michael Cera).

The enthusiastic youngster is thrilled to discover his absent-adoptive father is actually Gotham’s Caped Crusader, but Batman struggles to handle his hyper tendances. Can the two work together to become an ultra-crime fighting duo?

Meanwhile, Gotham has a new villain on the loose; The Joker (Zach Galifianakis). Along with Harley Quinn (Jenny Slate), the two are reaping havoc across Gotham City, and only Batman and Robin can stop them.

This hilarious adventure is brought to you by the team who created 2014’s The Lego Movie, including original director Chris McKay.

Will Arnett (The Lego Movie, Despicable Me) reprises his role as Batman, with Michael Cera (Juno, Scott Pilgrim vs. the World) voices plucky Robin. Joining the stars are Ralph Fiennes (Harry Potter), Zach Galifianakis (Birdman), Jenny Slate (Zootropolis), Rosario Dawson (Sin City) and Mariah Carey.

Enjoy the adventure with all the family in amazing 3D, IMAX or IMAX 3D at selected Vue cinemas!

He's LEGO Batman. He only wears black or sometimes very very dark grey and now he has his own movie.
films.info_cast: Will Arnett

films.title: The Lego Ninjago Movie
films.synopsis_intro: Two brothers – one a wise Sensei, the other an evil warlord – fight against one another, as Sensei Wu’s homeland, Ninjago, comes under threat.
films.synopsis_short: Two brothers – one a wise Sensei, the other an evil warlord – fight against one another, as Sensei Wu’s homeland, Ninjago, comes under threat.
films.synopsis_full:
In a story of good ninja vs. bad ninja, the Ninjitsu are about to go head to head, throwing star to throwing star, as two brothers face off.

Sensei Wu (Jackie Chan) seeks to hire six ninjas, who he can train to become true heroes of the night.

The chosen six might be gifted warriors, but they’re also a band of teens struggling with high school life.

Once they are in place, they are frequently tasked with vanquishing evil monsters, while riding around in awesome vehicles.

But a threat much worse than your average monster is lurking in the shadows, about to reveal itself. Hungry warlord, Lord Garmadon (Justin Theroux), plots his revenge on Sensei Wu, his brother.
In a tale of wise Sensei vs. evil warlord, who will come out on top in the battle for Ninjitsu supremacy?

The Lego Ninjago Movie sees the voice-acting talents of Jackie Chan (Kung Fu Panda 3), Dave Franco (Now You See Me 2), Olivia Munn (X-Men: Apocalypse), and other stars turn into Lego form, and is based on the Lego Ninjago toy line and Masters of Spinjitzu animated series.

Charlie Bean directs the latest movie to spawn from the Lego franchise, having worked on a selection of animated movies and TV shows before, including Dexter’s Laboratory and The Powerpuff Girls Movie.

Ninjago is available to watch in stunning 3D at selected Vue Cinemas!
films.info_cast: Olivia Munn, Dave Franco, Jackie Chan

films.title: The Levelling - BIFA Independents
films.synopsis_intro: The Levelling tells the story of trainee veterinarian Clover Catto (Ellie Kendrick) as she returns to the farm where she grew up after hearing news that her brother Harry has died in an apparent suicide. Finding the family home in ruins following recent floods that devastated the Somerset area, Clover is forced to confront her difficult father Aubrey about the farm, the livestock and, crucially, the details surrounding Harry’s death.
films.synopsis_short: The Levelling tells the story of trainee veterinarian Clover Catto (Ellie Kendrick) as she returns to the farm where she grew up after hearing news that her brother Harry has died in an apparent suicide. Finding the family home in ruins following recent floods that devastated the Somerset area, Clover is forced to confront her difficult father Aubrey about the farm, the livestock and, crucially, the details surrounding Harry’s death.
films.synopsis_full:
As the funeral approaches, Clover's discoveries send her on an emotional journey and   a reckoning - with the land, her family and herself.

The film’s writer / director, Hope Dickson-Leach, was nominated for the Best Debut Screenwriter award at BIFA 2016, and long-listed for the Douglas Hickox Debut Director Award and the Discovery Award. Leading actress Ellie Kendrick, who eagle-eyed viewers will recognise from TV's Game of Thrones and Misfits, was long-listed for the BIFA 2016 Most Promising Newcomer Award.
films.info_cast: Ellie Kendrick, David Troughton, Jack Holden

films.title: The Limehouse Golem
films.synopsis_intro: A serial killer stalks the Limehouse streets of Victorian London in 1880, and the terrified population of this squalid district of the East End believe that the "Golem", a monster from Judaic mythology, is responsible.
films.synopsis_short: A serial killer stalks the Limehouse streets of Victorian London in 1880, and the terrified population of this squalid district of the East End believe that the "Golem", a monster from Judaic mythology, is responsible.
films.synopsis_full:
Inspector Kildare of Scotland Yard is handed the impossible task of solving these heinous crimes and his investigations lead him on a race across the capital from The Old Bailey, to Newgate Prison, to the music halls of London and the British Museum.

His chief suspects are music hall superstar Dan Leno, political agitator Karl Marx, writer and philosopher George Gissing and journalist John Cree. Kildare believes that famed performer Little Lizzie Cree, who is almost certainly destined to hang for the poisoning of her husband, holds the key to the identity of the real Golem.

Kildare must solve the case and in doing so, he believes he will save the life of Elizabeth Cree.
films.info_cast: Bill Nighy, Douglas Booth, Olivia Cooke

films.title: The Little Vampire
films.synopsis_intro: With the help of a mortal, Rudolph must save his family from a notorious vampire hunter.
films.synopsis_short: With the help of a mortal, Rudolph must save his family from a notorious vampire hunter.
films.synopsis_full: At selected locations, The Little Vampire is available to watch in fully-immersive 3D action.
films.info_cast: Jim Carter, Rasmus Hardiker, Alice Krige

films.title: The Mountain Between Us
films.synopsis_intro: Two plane crash survivors must join together to fight the elements when they become stranded in the mountains.
films.synopsis_short: Two plane crash survivors must join together to fight the elements when they become stranded in the mountains.
films.info_cast: Idris Elba, Kate Winslet, Marci T. House

films.title: The Mummy
films.synopsis_intro: An ancient curse is unleashed on the modern world when the crypt of a princess is discovered…
films.synopsis_short: An ancient curse is unleashed on the modern world when the crypt of a princess is discovered…
films.synopsis_full:
In a modern world, it’s all too easy to forget the horrors lurking in the past…

Beneath the harsh desert sands lays an ancient princess. Entombed before her time was due, her life was snatched away from her.

Centuries alone, her bitter resentment grew. It seemed she would forever be compelled to languish beneath the earth.

One day her tomb is discovered… and she is released onto the world. Hundreds of years after her original reign, the princess releases havoc and horror onto a world that doesn’t recognise her kind any more.

Starring Tom Cruise (Jack Reacher: Never Go Back), Russell Crowe (The Nice Guys), Annabelle Wallis (Come and Find Me) and Sophia Boutella (Star Trek Beyond), The Mummy is an electrifying reboot of this classic monster franchise.
films.info_cast: Sofia Boutella, Tom Cruise

films.film_page_name: The Nut Job 2 Nutty By Nature
films.title: The Nut Job 2 Nutty By Nature
films.synopsis_intro: Surly the squirrel is back, and this time he’s up against an army of bulldozers in this animated comedy.
films.synopsis_short: Surly the squirrel is back, and this time he’s up against an army of bulldozers in this animated comedy.
films.synopsis_full:
After their ordeal securing their home at Nibblers Nut Shop, squirrels Surly (Will Arnett) and Andie (Katherine Heigl) and their furry friends thought they finally had it made.

Until the shop explodes!

Their belongings, shelter and, most importantly, peanut butter is completely destroyed. They must find a new place to live – and quick.

Luckily, just around the corner, there’s a lush forest, golden sunshine and enough food for everyone. The beauty of Liberty Park beckons, and they decide to settle there, where they’ll have space to thrive and plenty of nuts to go around. Home at last.

Until the Mayor (Bobby Moynihan) announces his plans to bulldoze every single inch of it. He’s going to rip up every tree, trample every meadow and pluck every last flower so he can build a giant amusement park and make bags of money.

But Surly isn’t prepared to let that happen. With the help of Andie, along with Precious the pug (Maya Rudolph) and the other misfit animals, he sets out to stop The Mayor and his bulldozers in their tracks…

The hilarious sequel to the 2014 hit animated comedy, The Nut Job 2: Nutty By Nature is directed by Cal Brunker, who has been part of the team behind Despicable Me and The Secret Life of Pets.

The film stars the vocal talent of Arnett (The Lego Batman Movie), Heigl (Grey’s Anatomy) and Rudolph (The Angry Birds Movie).
films.info_cast: Will Arnett, Katherine Heigl, Maya Rudolph

films.title: The Predator
films.synopsis_intro: The celebrated franchise returns, with a whole new threat: The Predator.
films.synopsis_short: The celebrated franchise returns, with a whole new threat: The Predator.
films.info_cast: Olivia Munn, Boyd Holbrook, 50 Cent

films.title: The Red Turtle
films.synopsis_intro: Through the story of a man shipwrecked on a tropical island inhabited by turtles, crabs and birds, 'The Red Turtle' recounts the milestones in the life of a human being.
films.synopsis_short: Through the story of a man shipwrecked on a tropical island inhabited by turtles, crabs and birds, 'The Red Turtle' recounts the milestones in the life of a human being.

films.film_page_name: The Royal Ballet Bernstein Triple Bill
films.title: The Royal Ballet: Bernstein Triple Bill
films.synopsis_intro: The Royal Ballet celebrates the centenary of Leonard Bernstein's birth with an all-Bernstein programme from choreographers Wayne McGregor, Liam Scarlett and Christopher Wheeldon.
films.synopsis_short: The Royal Ballet celebrates the centenary of Leonard Bernstein's birth with an all-Bernstein programme from choreographers Wayne McGregor, Liam Scarlett and Christopher Wheeldon.
films.synopsis_full: The programme includes two world premieres by Resident Choreographer Wayne McGregor and Artistic Associate Christopher Wheeldon, marking each artist's first foray into Bernstein. At the heart of the programme is the first revival of Artist in Residence Liam Scarlett's The Age of Anxiety, created in 2014 to Bernstein's soul-searching Second Symphony.

films.title: The Royal Ballet: Manon
films.synopsis_intro: Manon's brother Lescaut is offering her to the highest bidder when she meets Des Grieux and falls in love. They elope to Paris, but when Monsieur G.M. offers Manon a life of luxury as his mistress she can't resist.
films.synopsis_short: Manon's brother Lescaut is offering her to the highest bidder when she meets Des Grieux and falls in love. They elope to Paris, but when Monsieur G.M. offers Manon a life of luxury as his mistress she can't resist.
films.synopsis_full: With the Lescauts' encouragement Des Grieux cheats at cards in an attempt to win Monsieur G.M.'s fortune. They are caught. Manon is arrested as a prostitute and deported to New Orleans, followed by Des Grieux. On the run, Manon dies from exhaustion.

films.title: The Royal Ballet: Swan Lake (2018)
films.synopsis_intro: Swan Lake has had a special role in the repertory of The Royal Ballet since 1934.
films.synopsis_short: Swan Lake has had a special role in the repertory of The Royal Ballet since 1934.
films.synopsis_full: This Season The Royal Ballet creates a new production with additional choreography by Artist in Residence Liam Scarlett. While remaining faithful to the Petipa-Ivanov text, Scarlett will bring fresh eyes to the staging of this classic ballet, in collaboration with his long-term designer John Macfarlane.

films.film_page_name: The Royal Ballet The Winters Tale (2018)
films.title: The Royal Ballet: The Winter's Tale (2018)
films.synopsis_intro: Christopher Wheeldon, Artistic Associate of The Royal Ballet, created his adaptation of Shakespeare's late great romance The Winter's Tale for The Royal Ballet in 2014.
films.synopsis_short: Christopher Wheeldon, Artistic Associate of The Royal Ballet, created his adaptation of Shakespeare's late great romance The Winter's Tale for The Royal Ballet in 2014.
films.synopsis_full: Building on the success of Alice's Adventures in Wonderland, The Winter's Tale received ecstatic praise at its premiere, acclaimed by critics and audiences alike for its intelligent, distinctive and emotionally powerful story, told through exquisite dance. It is now widely judged to be a modern ballet classic.

films.title: The Royal Opera: Carmen
films.synopsis_intro: Carmen is the best-known work by French composer Georges Bizet, and one of the most famous operas in the entire art form - numbers such as the Habanera and the Toreador Song have permeated the popular consciousness as little else has.
films.synopsis_short: Carmen is the best-known work by French composer Georges Bizet, and one of the most famous operas in the entire art form - numbers such as the Habanera and the Toreador Song have permeated the popular consciousness as little else has.
films.synopsis_full: The opera's heady combination of passion, sensuality and violence initially proved too much for the stage, and it was a critical failure on its 1875 premiere. Bizet died shortly after, and never learned of the spectacular success his Carmen would achieve: the opera has been performed more than five hundred times at Covent Garden alone.

films.title: The Royal Opera: La Boheme
films.synopsis_intro: Acclaimed director Richard Jones (Boris Godunov, Il trittico) directs a new production of Puccini's La boheme.
films.synopsis_short: Acclaimed director Richard Jones (Boris Godunov, Il trittico) directs a new production of Puccini's La boheme.
films.synopsis_full: When Rodolfo, a penniless poet, meets Mimi, a seamstress, they fall instantly in love. But their happiness is threatened when Rodolfo learns that Mimi is gravely ill.

films.title: The Royal Opera: Macbeth
films.synopsis_intro: Verdi's life-long love affair with Shakespeare's works began with Macbeth, a play he considered to be 'one of the greatest creations of man'.
films.synopsis_short: Verdi's life-long love affair with Shakespeare's works began with Macbeth, a play he considered to be 'one of the greatest creations of man'.
films.synopsis_full: With his librettist, Francesco Maria Piave, Verdi set out to create 'something out of the ordinary'. Their success is borne out in every bar of a score that sees Verdi at his most theatrical: it bristles with demonic energy.

films.title: The Royal Opera: Rigoletto
films.synopsis_intro: The corruption of innocence is at the heart of Verdi's potent tragedy in David McVicar's production for The Royal Opera.
films.synopsis_short: The corruption of innocence is at the heart of Verdi's potent tragedy in David McVicar's production for The Royal Opera.
films.synopsis_full: Rigoletto, court jester to the libertine Duke of Mantua, is cursed by the father of one of the Duke's victims for his irreverent laughter. When the Duke seduces Rigoletto's daughter Gilda, it seems the curse is taking effect...

films.film_page_name: The Royal Opera The Magic Flute
films.title: The Royal Opera: The Magic Flute
films.synopsis_intro: Mozart's glorious opera The Magic Flute is brought enchantingly to life in David McVicar's production with beautiful sets by John Macfarlane.
films.synopsis_short: Mozart's glorious opera The Magic Flute is brought enchantingly to life in David McVicar's production with beautiful sets by John Macfarlane.
films.synopsis_full: Prince Tamino promises the Queen of the Night that he will rescue her daughter Pamina from the enchanter Sarastro. He begins his quest, accompanied by the bird-catcher Papageno - but all is not as it seems...

films.title: The Royal Opera: Tosca
films.synopsis_intro: Jonathan Kent's production for The Royal Opera captures the dangerous political turbulence of Rome in 1800.
films.synopsis_short: Jonathan Kent's production for The Royal Opera captures the dangerous political turbulence of Rome in 1800.
films.synopsis_full: Tosca is one of the great evenings of opera, and from its strident opening chords conjures up a world of political instability and menace.

films.title: The Shack
films.synopsis_intro: When tragedy tears Mack and his family apart, it will take the most powerful spiritual intervention to try and save him from the ultimate despair.
films.synopsis_short: When tragedy tears Mack and his family apart, it will take the most powerful spiritual intervention to try and save him from the ultimate despair.
films.synopsis_full:
Mack Phillips (Sam Worthington) has come a long way since the troubled days of his youth. He’s living the American Dream – the proud head of one big happy family, with a beautiful wife, Nan (Rhada Mitchell), and three amazing children.

But it’s all about to fall apart in a horrific turn of events that go beyond Mack’s worst nightmares.

During a family camping trip, his two older children Kate (Megan Charpentier) and Josh (Gage Munroe) find themselves in danger while out on the lake in a canoe. Mack is able to reach them just in time, and the three reach the shore safely. However, in the midst of the chaos, his youngest daughter, Missy (Amélie Eve), disappears.

Panic leads to complete despair when the search comes to an end in a cabin in the woods, where they discover Missy’s terrible fate.

Now a broken man, Mick begins to slip into darkness. Just when he’s about to give up, a mysterious letter arrives in his mailbox signed from ‘Papa’, the name Missy used to call God.

The letter invites him to visit the very cabin where his life fell apart. With nothing to lose, Mick decides to go. He meets Papa (Octavia Spencer) and two other people, and so begins a spiritual journey in a quest to find his way back to being able to live again.

Stuart Hazeldine (Exam) directs this drama, which is based on William P. Young’s novel of the same name.
films.info_cast: Sam Worthington, Octavia Spencer, Tim McGraw

films.title: The Snowman
films.synopsis_intro: A woman goes missing. All that's left behind is her scarf, wrapped around the neck of a twisted-looking snowman. The hunt begins.
films.synopsis_short: A woman goes missing. All that's left behind is her scarf, wrapped around the neck of a twisted-looking snowman. The hunt begins.
films.info_cast: Chloë Sevigny, Rebecca Ferguson, Michael Fassbender

films.title: The Solutrean
films.synopsis_intro: Set 20,000 years ago, a man battles through Ice Age conditions, trying to find his way home.
films.synopsis_short: Set 20,000 years ago, a man battles through Ice Age conditions, trying to find his way home.
films.synopsis_full: See The Solutrean in stunning IMAX and IMAX 3D quality at Vue Cinemas.
films.info_cast: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Leonor Varela, Natassia Malthe

films.film_page_name: Thomas and Friends Journey Beyond Sodor
films.title: Thomas & Friends: Journey Beyond Sodor
films.synopsis_intro: Determined to prove his importance on Sodor, Thomas takes James' trucks and sets off on a big adventure to the Mainland.
films.synopsis_short: Determined to prove his importance on Sodor, Thomas takes James' trucks and sets off on a big adventure to the Mainland.

films.title: Thor: Ragnarok
films.synopsis_intro: Can the imprisoned Thor race across the universe in time to save his home world from the ruthless Hela?
films.synopsis_short: Can the imprisoned Thor race across the universe in time to save his home world from the ruthless Hela?
films.synopsis_full: See Thor: Ragnarok in eye-popping 3D and IMAX 3D at certain Vue Cinemas!
films.info_cast: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett

films.title: Tomb Raider
films.synopsis_intro: Lara Croft is determined to finish the archaeological work her father started, in order to clear his memory. But things soon take a dangerous turn...
films.synopsis_short: Lara Croft is determined to finish the archaeological work her father started, in order to clear his memory. But things soon take a dangerous turn...
films.info_cast: Alicia Vikander, Walton Goggins

films.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
films.synopsis_intro: Optimus Prime returns to Earth in the midst of the latest battle between man and machine, to search for a mystical object that will resurrect his home planet.
films.synopsis_short: Optimus Prime returns to Earth in the midst of the latest battle between man and machine, to search for a mystical object that will resurrect his home planet.
films.synopsis_full:
Optimus Prime (Peter Cullen): leader of the Autobots and all-round good guy. However, when he finds out that his home world of Cybertron is now a dead planet, he discovers that it was himself who was responsible for the devastation.

Is there a way to resurrect Cybertron back to its former glory? Optimus Prime believes there is, but to do so, he needs to return to Earth.

A mysterious artefact is his target, but to get to it, he must traverse the on-going battle between humans and robots – the Decepticons.

Can Optimus Prime save the human race from the latest robotic invasion and save his own planet at the same time?

Transformers: The Last Knight sees Mark Wahlberg (Deepwater Horizon) reprise his role as Cade Yeager, while this latest movie in the franchise also stars Peter Cullen (Motorcity) as the voice of Optimus Prime and John Goodman (Ratchet & Clank), who voices Hound.

Michael Bay returns to the director’s chair, having previously overseen all four films in the rebooted Transformers series.

See Transformers: The Last Knight in 3D, IMAX, and IMAX 3D at Vue Cinemas!
films.info_cast: Mark Wahlberg, Anthony Hopkins, John Goodman

films.film_page_name: Valerian And The City Of A Thousand Planets
films.title: Valerian And The City Of A Thousand Planets
films.synopsis_intro: Tasked with keeping peace across the universe, Valerian pairs up with Laureline. Together, they move through different planets and dimensions, facing unexpected challenges at every turn.
films.synopsis_short: Tasked with keeping peace across the universe, Valerian pairs up with Laureline. Together, they move through different planets and dimensions, facing unexpected challenges at every turn.
films.synopsis_full:
It’s the 28th century. Space and time are a playground that can be crossed and explored. The universe has unfolded to all, allowing different species to mingle and new worlds to develop.

But with growth comes responsibility – and danger.

Valerian (Dan DeHaan) is a no-nonsense agent, determined to follow protocol and systematically deliver results. Off the clock, however, he’s not so straight-laced…

Laureline (Cara Delevingne) is the opposite. Witty, courageous and a little bit risky, she’s known for using alternative tactics to get the job done. But when it comes to her personal life, she’s unexpectedly traditional.

Valerian doesn’t hide his desire to expand his relationship with Laureline beyond the professional realm, and she’s not shy about rejecting him. When their commander (Clive Owen) orders the pair to conduct an important mission, the two unlikely agents must learn to work together. 

They travel to Alpha, a whimsical city where the entire universe seems to converge. But in this vast fusion of culture and innovation, a great evil lurks in the shadows.

Based on the much-loved graphic novel of the same name, Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets sees director Luc Besson’s (The Fifth Planet) childhood passion come to life. With a star-studded cast of sci-fi rookies and pros alike, it features DeHaan (The Amazing Spider-Man 2) and Delevingne (Suicide Squad) alongside Ethan Hawke (Boyhood) and music-superstar Rhianna.

Transport yourself into a whole new dimension and book tickets in intergalactic 3D!
films.info_cast: Cara Delevingne, Dane DeHaan
